responsibilities: Developed and executed multi-channel digital marketing campaigns that increased brand awareness by 25% over 12 months.
Managed the editorial calendar for social media platforms, overseeing content creation and community engagement.
Collaborated with the sales team to design lead generation landing pages, improving conversion rates by 10%.
Conducted market research and competitive analysis to identify new growth opportunities in the Pacific Northwest region.
Assisted in the production of weekly email newsletters and tracked performance metrics such as open and click-through rates.
Supported the SEO team by performing keyword research and updating meta descriptions for client websites.
